title: [BUG] Failed to save runebook due to corrupted runebook
body: Upon trying to save rune pages I keep running into the error; Failed to save runebook due to corrupted runebook. Last patch it came up as: Failed to save runepage due to network failure. I was just wondering whether this is a bug based on my behalf or if other people were getting it too, also if there is a way to solve it? If not rito pls, I sent in a bug report on both occasions so I hope this helps furthermore bring awareness to it.

replies.body:
This is something support will have to resolve for you manually as I understand it. The bug isn't on your side (rune pages are saved Riot side) so it's not something you can fix from your end unfortunately.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
